Class Internship

java.lang.Object
models.Internship
public class Internship extends Object
Represents an Internship opportunity posted by a company. Contains all relevant information such as title, company, eligibility, dates, slots, and status.

  • Constructor Details

    • Internship

      public Internship(String id, String title, String company, String representativeId, String major, String yearType, String description, LocalDate openDate, LocalDate closeDate, int slots, boolean visible, String status)
      Constructor for Internship.
      Parameters:
      id - Unique internship ID
      title - Internship title
      company - Name of the company
      representativeId - User ID of the company representative
      major - Target major for the internship
      yearType - Eligibility level (Basic/Intermediate/Advanced)
      description - Description of the internship
      openDate - Date applications open
      closeDate - Date applications close
      slots - Number of available slots
      visible - Whether the internship is visible to students
      status - Current status (Pending/Approved/Rejected/Filled)
